channel.title: Nocco Example Site
channel.description: Recent content on Nocco Example Site

item.title: Building a Personal Website in 2024
item.description:
A personal website is your corner of the internet. Unlike social media profiles that come and go, your own domain is permanent real estate that you control completely.

The modern web has made this easier than ever. Static site generators like Hugo let you build fast, secure sites without databases or complex infrastructure. You write in Markdown, push to Git, and your site deploys automatically.

Why bother? Because owning your content matters. When platforms change their algorithms or shut down entirely, your personal site remains. It’s where you can experiment, express yourself, and build something that’s truly yours.

San Francisco, California

The perfect evening light catching the iconic bridge. Sometimes you just need to stop and appreciate the view.

Berlin Half Marathon 2024 Berlin, Germany 21.1 km 1:45:32 4:59/km

Perfect weather for a fast race. Negative split with the last 5k being the fastest. The crowd support along Unter den Linden was incredible.

Swiss Alps

Early morning hike rewarded with this perfect mirror reflection. The water was so still you could barely tell which way was up.
Just a quick note without a title. This is how microblog-style posts appear in the theme.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
This is a sample post with a title. It demonstrates how the theme renders titled articles with the full header including the post name and date.

Here’s some example content with bold and italic text.
